alert.note: Alert for Highland; Pike; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 4:58PM EDT until July 18 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Pike County in southwestern Ohio... Northeastern Highland County in southwestern Ohio... Southwestern Ross County in southwestern Ohio... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 457 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Leesburg, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Bainbridge, Rocky Fork Point, Cynthiana, Highland Holiday, Rocky Fork Lake, Rainsboro and Paint Creek State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
